00015 class AZUREFBuffer {
00016  public:
00021   AZUREFBuffer(int entranceKey,int exitKey,std::string outputdir) {
00022     char filename[256];
00023     entrancekey_=entranceKey;
00024     exitkey_=exitKey;
00025     sprintf(filename,"%sAZUREOut_aa=%d_R=%d.out",outputdir.c_str(),entranceKey,exitKey);
00026     fbuffer_=new std::filebuf;
00027     fbuffer_->open(filename,std::ios::out);
00028     assert(fbuffer_->is_open());
00029   };
00033   ~AZUREFBuffer() {
00034     fbuffer_->close();
00035     delete fbuffer_;
00036   };
00040   int GetEntranceKey() const {return entrancekey_;};
00044   int GetExitKey() const {return exitkey_;}
00048   std::filebuf *GetFBuffer() {return fbuffer_;};
00049  private:
00050   int entrancekey_;
00051   int exitkey_;
00052   std::filebuf *fbuffer_;
00053 };
